infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Praxiom Health needs Bluetooth to connect to your PineTime smartwatch for health monitoring.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Praxiom Health needs Bluetooth to sync health data with your smartwatch.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Praxiom Health needs access to your health data to calculate your biological age.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Praxiom Health needs to save health data.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Praxiom Health needs motion data for fitness tracking.
